quest.name: Absolute Faith
journal: Nigen's brother should have returned from his errand by now.
objectives: Find Nigen's brother and slay any enemies that appear.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Hello there, adventurer. There is something I would ask of you if you have the time.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: My brother spoke with the udgan for the first time today. The elder gods declared that he must collect his own weight in grass from the field to the southwest.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: However, that field is home to many a deadly beast. I want nothing more than to check on his safety, but the gods have said I must cook our family's meals today.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: My brother should still be gathering grass to the southwest. Please, go and check on him for me.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: My brother should still be gathering grass to the southwest. Please, go and check on him for me.

dialogue.name: NIGENBROTHER02766
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you. I only let my guard down for a moment, but it was more than enough time for those creatures to attack.

dialogue.name: NIGENBROTHER02766
dialogue.text: You do not need to accompany me the rest of the way. It is time I proved myself strong enough to carry out what the gods ask of me on my own.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Did you find my brother? He is still yet to return.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: Thank you for your help. My brother is returned at last.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: We Mol consider the elder gods' orders to be absolute. We must follow them even if it means endangering our lives.

dialogue.name: NIGEN
dialogue.text: This is a small token of thanks from my brother and I.
